programme.title: Christmas with da Fam
programme.desc: After Malcom proposes to Serenity, she takes him home to meet her family for the holidays. The spirit is alive, until they discover that Serenity’s ex Denzel is living with her family after a house fire. A rivalry develops between Malcolm and Denzel that ends up in a hilarious battle of wits over the holiday weekend.

programme.title: Mixed Christmas
programme.desc: Aurora wants to enjoy the holidays this year in some warmth and sunshine, and invites her three best friends to Miami for a Christmas trip to remember. When they arrive at their AirBnb, they discover it’s been double booked…by Aurora’s ex-girlfriend and her new partner Axel. They have no choice but to combine their plans, and celebrate the holiday together.

programme.title: The Last Days of an Escort
programme.desc: Kitty, a struggling escort, agrees to be documented for a film. Her roommate, Star, a more successful escort, reluctantly joins. A new client, Earl, changes their lives forever when he asks to see Kitty and Star together. Kitty's world becomes increasingly dangerous as she navigates the dark underworld of escorting.

programme.title: Teacher's Pet
programme.desc: A young and charming student enters a new school, but he has a way to get what he wants, including manipulating his teacher. When she tries to end their inappropriate relationship, people start to die around her. Will she make it out of this relationship alive?

programme.title: The Wake Up Call
programme.desc: Stefan Malone, a gifted student in science and math, is crushed when he finds out about his mother’s cancer diagnosis. He dedicates his life and research to finding a cure at Emerson, but will his dedication and determination consume him?

programme.title: Too Little Too Late
programme.desc: James “Honcho” Young II is a well-respected boss but his position is threatened by his ex-love, turned partner, Ryan “Rain” Mills who desperately wants to be next in line. Driven by jealousy, love and money, Rain sets her sights on taking what’s hers, causing Honcho to lose more than just his position. Can she afford the cost to be boss?

programme.title: Back and Forth
programme.desc: Pier and Jade found love though the emotions of skating. Love was built but trust was lost, as deep secrets unfold, back and forth between the UK and USA. Having her heart broken, Jade took her fate in her own hands. It was only a matter of time, that the only plan left was to take revenge.

programme.title: Tilt
programme.desc: When a local drug dealer is arrested and put in jail, he asks his daughter Diamond to run his operation. Diamond takes control of the empire, however it doesn’t sit well with members of the crew. Diamond gets word, from her trusted sources, that two members of the crew are plotting to overthrow her Father’s drug empire. Diamond must get rid of the two disloyal members of the crew before they take control of the operation.

programme.title: Predatory Behavior
programme.desc: When women start disappearing all over the city, Detective Powell and Scott take on the case hoping to bring the culprit to justice. Can they find the elusive killer or will it be to late for the next victim.

programme.title: What A Day Before Christmas
programme.desc: Nathan and Naomi are at odds about the direction of their marriage, and Nathan‚Äôs reluctance to get in the Christmas Spirit. As an ultimatum, Naomi insists Nathan spend the holidays with her and her family, but it‚Äôs Christmas Eve. Nathan enlists the help of his cousin Keith, and the two embark on a road trip and race against time to get home for the holidays and save his marriage.

programme.title: Glistening in the Snow
programme.desc: When struggling club owner Anaja finds out that her co-owner, Donovan, is coming to town for the holiday, she expects him to help keep the doors open. However, his fiancé Addie wants him to sell the club. When the owners and staff are trapped in the club during a snow storm, they will have to work together to resolve their issues with each other.

programme.title: Missing You This Christmas
programme.desc: Carmen’s family has an annual Christmas tradition that supports her neighborhood. When her mother dies suddenly, she looses the holiday spirit, and no longer wants to continue, until she’s visited by her late father’s spirit who encourages her to keep hope alive.

programme.title: A Holiday for Harmony
programme.desc: Jaxon Moore is a struggling arcade bar owner with debt and facing a possible shutdown before the holiday season. When his sister dies unexpectedly in a car crash, he becomes the guardian of his young niece Harmony, who inherited a trust fund from her late mother. Jaxon hopes he can use the trust to save his struggling business, but faces obstacles when Harmony‚Äôs father decides to come back into her life.

programme.title: Rain for Christmas
programme.desc: Malik decides to bring his girlfriend home to Houston for Christmas. When she meets his family, they think he is all wrong for her. He meets his grandpa‚Äôs nurse, Rain, and soon realizes the true meaning of love and what he really wants for Christmas.

programme.title: Naughty or Nice
programme.desc: Melody, an exotic dancer, and her doctor boyfriend, Patrick, prepare to spend the holidays with Patrick’s family. When they arrive, they are met by Patrick’s overprotective judgmental mother, and she unleashes her wrath on Melody, as she’s not good enough for her son. Will Melody become part of the family? Or succumb to Patrick’s mother’s insecurities.

programme.title: Christmas with da Fam
programme.desc: After Malcom proposes to Serenity, she takes him home to meet her family for the holidays. The spirit is alive, until they discover that Serenity’s ex Denzel is living with her family after a house fire. A rivalry develops between Malcolm and Denzel that ends up in a hilarious battle of wits over the holiday weekend.
